short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find results in your favorite search engine while simultaneously raising money through GoodSearch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search using your favorite search engine while mirroring your searches to a background tab of Goodsearch to raise money for causes you care about!

This extension observes your searches in popular search engines (Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Yahoo, AOL), and searches for that same term with Goodsearch simultaneously. Users then have the option of using Goodsearch's results to raise money for causes they are passionate about.
